name: Fog
text: This glyph reduces the base Strength of non-Hero Units to 1.

name: Frost
text: This glyph reduces the base Strength of all non-Hero Units to 1.

name: Inspire
text: This glyph doubles the Strength of all non-Hero Units.

name: Rain
text: This glyph reduces the base Strength of non-Hero Units to 1.

name: Spores
text: This glyph adds +4 to the Strength of all non-Hero Units.
